description: This is a Flutter application main file that sets up the app's entry point, theme, and a simple home page with a loading indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, building the UI with an app bar and a loading indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, constructing the widget tree.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
